tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Played in four events on PGA Tour Canada in and made two cuts, with his best performance coming at the ATB Financial Classic (T23)...Finished T135 at the Web.com Tour Q-School in December.

2011: Played in the U.S. Open, made the cut and finished 71st.

2010: Finished T4 at the Corona Mazatlan Mexican PGA Championship. 

2009: Had another solid year, finishing in the top 10 six times. Saw his streak of winning at least one championship each season end at three years. Played in the RBC Canadian Open.

2008: Played in the RBC Canadian Open...Finished T2 at the Mexican PGA Championship, the Tour Championship, and the Greater Vancouver Charity Classic...Secured three more top-10 finishes, at the Desjardins Montreal Open (T5), the Times Colonist Open (T7) and Seaforth (T9).

2007: Finished T7 at the San Jose International and the Jane Rogers Championship.

2006: Won the Canadian Bursary. 

2001: Made his PGA TOUR debut, playing in the U.S. Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2000 Alberta Amateur and was the runner-up at the 1999 Canadian Amateur.
tourBios.personal: First-tee entrance song would be "Human" by Metallica...Favorite restaurant is Mama's Fish House in Maui...Favorite book is Last of the Breed...Has a Calgary Flames head cover on his driver and his favorite pro team is the NHL's Calgary Flames...Favorite sporting event attended was a Stanley Cup playoff game in which the Flames won...Would be an architect is he weren't playing golf...Favorite entertainers are Collective Soul and Oasis, and his dream foursome includes Ben Hogan, Jack Nicklaus and Byron Nelson.

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Made three cuts in five events, best finish was a T15 at the ATB Financial Classic in August.

2014: Made two cuts in four starts with his best finish a top 25 (T23) at the ATB Financial Classic...Finished T135 at the Web.com Tour Q-School in December. 

2013: Made six cuts in nine events with season-best finish, a T33 at The Great Waterway Classic in August.

2012: Made five cuts in eight starts. Posted four top 25s, including a season-best T6 at the Jamieson WFCU Windsor Roseland Charity Classic.

2011: Played in the U.S. Open, made the cut and finished 71st.

2010: Finished T4 at the Corona Mazatlan Mexican PGA Championship.

2009: Had another solid year finishing in the top 10 six times. First of three T10s came at Corona Mazatlan Mexican, the Times Colonist Open and Desjardins Montreal Open; a T9 at the TELUS Edmonton Open; a T7 at the Seaforth Country Classic and a T6 at the Canadian Tour Chempionship. Saw his streak of winning at least one championship each season end (started in 2006). Played at the RBC Canadian Open (missed the cut).

2008: Made 13 cuts in 14 starts with one win at The Players Cup and seven top 10s. First top 10 (T2) came at the Corona Mazatlan Championship in April...A T7 at the Times Colonist Open with all rounds in the 60s came mid-June...Got off to a shaky start at the Vancouver Charity Classic with an opening round-73 but recovered nicely with rounds of 66-67-70 to T2...Found his stride at The Players Cup to win by one stroke over John Ellis and Dustin Risdon...Followed that with three top 10s, a (T5) at the Desjardins Montreal Open, ninth at the Seaforth Country Classic and a T2 at the Canadian Tour Championship. Played in the RBC Canadian Open (missed the cut).

2007: Won the Riviera Nayarit Classic in May in Mexico, the Northern California Classic and the Alberta Open on the Canadian Tour. Finished T7 at the San Jose International and the Jane Rogers Championship. 

2006: Won the Casino de Montreal Open for the Players Championshp on the Canadian Tour. Won the Canadian Bursary.

2001: Played in the U.S. Open (missed the cut).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: 2000 Alberta Amateur champion...Runner-up at the 1999 Canadian Amateur.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2008 at the The Players Cup.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T49th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
